title: What Is Immunotherapy? | Immunotherapy for Cancer
description: Immunotherapy is treatment that uses your body's own immune system to help fight cancer. Learn about the different types of immunotherapies & their side effects.

Immunotherapy is treatment that uses a person's own immune system to fight cancer. Immunotherapy can boost or change how the immune system works so it can find and attack cancer cells. If your treatment plan includes immunotherapy, knowing how it works and what to expect can often help you prepare for treatment and make informed decisions about your care.
